logout

public int logout(java.lang.String sessionKey)
Logout user with sessionKey

Parameters:
sessionKey - The sessionKey for the loggedInUser
Returns:
Returns 1 on success, exception otherwise.

login

public java.lang.String login(java.lang.String username,
                              java.lang.String password)
                       throws javax.security.auth.login.LoginException
Login using a username and password only. Creates a session containing the userId and returns the key for the session.

Parameters:
username - The username to check
password - The password to check
Returns:
Returns the key for the session created
Throws:
javax.security.auth.login.LoginException - Throws a LoginException if the user can't be logged in.

login

public java.lang.String login(java.lang.String username,
                              java.lang.String password,
                              java.lang.Integer durationIn)
                       throws javax.security.auth.login.LoginException
Login using a username and password only. Creates a session containing the userId and returns the key for the session.

Parameters:
username - Username to check
password - Password to check
durationIn - The session duration
Returns:
Returns the key for the session
Throws:
javax.security.auth.login.LoginException - Throws a LoginException if the user can't be logged in.

checkAuthToken

public int checkAuthToken(java.lang.String login,
                          java.lang.String token)
This method is used to see if an external service is handing back an authorized token indicating that the server trusts the requester in some manner. This is currently used in the integration with Cobbler; however, it may be used for other services in the future.

Parameters:
login - login of the user to check against token
token - token to validate
Returns:
1 if the token is valid with this username, 0 otherwise.
